INSTRUCTIONS FOR POPULATING THE APP
Step 1. Go to directory structure DITTimetableApp on your android device after app has been installed

step 2. 
create a text file timetable.txtor download the template at https://goo.gl/XTVoTp

step 3. 
next read the instructions below on how to format your classes. This is manually entered in the synthax of the following :
1,hh,module,class_room, 
keep in mind the following coma , all fields must be seperated by a coma underscore _ for words such as web development ensure to leave no white space and use the underscore like so web_development no full stops or any other punctuation. it is important to follow these structure rules for mytimetable.txt file or else your timetable will not load. I have also included a template to use so you can just edit the fields to match your timetable.

example entry:

1,9,free,no_class, 
1,10,networking,Annex_3022,
NOTE: if you do not have a class a specific hour please enter No_Class and also for the room class room specify No_Class
